He was too young to understand what "limits" meant - and maybe that's why he broke them.
Budhia Singh: Born to Run - inspired by the incredible true story of the world's youngest marathon runner. A story of pain, purpose, and passion - of a child who ran not just to win, but to prove that dreams have no age.
This isn't just a film - it's a reminder that greatness begins when you refuse to stop.

A story of pain, purpose, and passion - of a child who ran not just to win, but to prove that dreams have no age.
